params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.value
params.description: Optional. The definition of the parameter value. It can be: - a constant string, - a parameter value defined as $parameter_name, - an original parameter value defined as $parameter_name.original, - a parameter value from some context defined as #context_name.parameter_name.

params.name: data.default_value
params.description: Optional. The default value to use when the value yields an empty result. Default values can be extracted from contexts by using the following syntax: #context_name.parameter_name.

params.name: data.entity_type_display_name
params.description: Optional. The name of the entity type, prefixed with @, that describes values of the parameter. If the parameter is required, this must be provided.

params.name: data.mandatory
params.description: Optional. Indicates whether the parameter is required. That is, whether the intent cannot be completed without collecting the parameter value.

params.name: data.prompts
params.description: Optional. The collection of prompts that the agent can present to the user in order to collect a value for the parameter.

params.name: data.is_list
params.description: Optional. Indicates whether the parameter represents a list of values.
